mapper.select: SELECT a.eventId,a.province,a.city,a.address,a.picture,a.begintime,a.endtime,a.peoppleNum,b.sponsorName,a.`bmendtime`,a.title,a.status FROM `cms_event` a LEFT JOIN cms_event_sponsor b ON a.sponsorId = b.sponsorId WHERE STATUS=2 ORDER BY createtime DESC limit 1

SELECT a.eventId,a.province,a.city,a.address,a.picture,a.begintime,a.endtime,a.peoppleNum,b.sponsorName,a.`bmendtime`,a.title,a.status FROM `cms_event` a LEFT JOIN cms_event_sponsor b ON a.sponsorId = b.sponsorId WHERE STATUS in (2,3) ORDER BY createtime DESC
SELECT fieldkey,fieldvalue FROM `cms_event_model_item` a LEFT JOIN cms_view_sys_dict b ON a.`field`=b.`fieldValue` WHERE b.dictid='bmbtzl' AND eventid=#{eventid}
SELECT COUNT(applyid) `count` FROM `cms_event_apply` WHERE userid=#{userid} and eventid=#{eventid}
